Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Niraparib tosylate monohydrate is approved to treat adults with:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Ovarian epithelial, fallopian tube, or primary peritoneal cancer. It is used:As maintenance therapy in patients with advanced cancer who are having a complete or partial response to first-line platinum chemotherapy. As maintenance therapy in patients whose cancer came back and has a germline mutation in the BRCA1 or BRCA2 gene. It is used in patients who are having a complete or partial response to platinum chemotherapy.

Section.Para: Niraparib tosylate monohydrate is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
